poem:
### Matters of the Heart

Ambushed by springtime's tangerine hue,  
El Corazón kissed the lips of two,  
cocktail swells in a shared balloon,  
golden carriage under a summer moon.  
Swedish daylight lingers, a halo's weave,  
urging secrets, twilight's sieve.  
Giddy rides on tracks of ink,  
hearts in motion, on rails they sync.
